Technique: PRESSED IN A FORM/MODEL; ENGRAVED; PAINTED
Name: Terracotta of Harpocrates
Description: Representation of Harpocrates, standing and leaning against a column, with the index finger of is right hand at the mouth and supporting the horn of plenty with his left arm. He is wearing a double crown and a long foot-length tunic. The piece bears remnants of the preparatory ground in white.
